title: Game randomly minimizes and I have no idea what to do to fix it.
body:
Things I've done so far:

-Uninstalled and reinstalled League
-Clean boot, still did it even with all non-microsoft apps running
-Ran SFC Scan, found no corrupted files/apps in system files

I'm running Windows 10 right now.

The game usually minimizes right between the 1-3 minute mark of the game, sometimes it happens twice. I don't know what else to do. It is literally causing me to lose games. Does anyone else experience this and if so, what can I do to fix it?
